General_Description: '''The Terror of Ares''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Sparta]] is worried about a new presence in their land. Kill [[Followers of Ares|Followers]] of [[Ares]], and the reward will be yours. – [[Nation Leader|Leader]] of (region)
Section_Outcome: Kassandra sought out and slew a number of Followers of Ares in the Spartan region, gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: This very same contract appears also under the names [[Cursed Lands]], [[Shedding Ares's Blood]], and [[Spartan Territories]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
